Html:
The docs

   http://quickgraph.codeplex.com/wikipage?title=Developer%20Manual&referringTitle=Home

say VS2008 is required. I've only found a VS2010 sln in the source. Is there a VS2008 sln, or how do you use this with VS2008?
Sorry, we have migrated the solution to VS2010.

Then it would probably be better to change

Requires Visual Studio 2008

to say

Requires Visual Studio 2008 (but the VS solution file is only provided for Visual Studio 2010)
